cast.overview: The lively João Grilo and the sly Chicó are poor guys living in the hinterland who cheat a bunch of people in a small town in Northeastern Brazil. When they die, they have to be judged by Christ, the Devil and the Virgin Mary before they are admitted to paradise.
cast.title: A Dog's Will

details.biography: Rogério Cardoso was a Brazilian actor, comedian, musician, composer and councilman. He established himself in several areas of entertainment, in a career spanning five decades, but it was in the comedy industry that he gained prominence, having performed in several comedy programs on the country's main broadcasters.
details.name: Rogério Cardoso
